source:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_00Alpa's plans for Castellum Velodyna are facing opposition.
※The difficulty of this quest will be synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限
カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパは、冒険者に相談したいことがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_01Castellum Velodyna looms large over Ala Mhigo, and it is a constant reminder of years of suffering at the hands of the Garleans that many citizens would rather see destroyed. Alpa seeks to placate those who oppose her project by introducing traditional Ala Mhigan designs, but she lacks the knowledge required to make informed choices. You suggest speaking to Tahla Molkoh stationed at Castrum Oriens, who is a wellspring of information on local history.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_01※本クエストには
「 レベルアジャスト受注クラス・ジョブ制限」が、
　設定されています。
　受注時と同じクラス・ジョブでのみ進行できます。

アルパと話した。エシャナの報告によると、現在のサリーシャの脱皮状況は、スベスベ期であるという。帝国の支配の象徴である、カステッルム・ベロジナを爆破せよと声を荒げる者たちを沈静化させるため、橋の一部にアラミゴ風の意匠を加えることになった。ギラバニア辺境地帯のカストルム・オリエンスにいる、「タラ・モルコー少牙士」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_02<tab>Tahla Molkoh recommends the traditional motif of a pair of griffins, which symbolizes everlasting loyalty. This gives Alpa the idea of crafting a pair of metal griffin statues to decorate the castellum. Feeling that it would be best to base the sculptures on a real griffin, J'olhmyn suggests consulting Giff the beast trainer at Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_02<tab>タラ・モルコー少牙士と話した。ラールガーズリーチの「ギッフ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_03<tab>Giff expresses his opposition to the Gatekeepers and their plans for the castellum, but promises to supply a griffin as thanks for your commitment to the Resistance. He will meet with you and the others in Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_03<tab>ギッフと話した。カステッルム・ベロジナの「アルパ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_04<tab>Giff reaches the castellum as promised, but is displeased when he hears that his griffin will be used as a basis for Alpa's statues. Although he is reluctant to help with what he considers to be a pointless endeavor, he agrees all the same. According to Giff, a griffin is at its most dynamic when creating its characteristic gusts of wind, with which they subdue their prey. Much to his surprise, Alpa expresses a desire to experience this powerful attack for herself to better understand the true nature of the winged beast. As Giff refuses to have any further part in this absurd plan, Alpa nominates you to ride the griffin.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_04<tab>アルパと話した。美しいグリフィンの彫像を造ろうと意気込むアルパに対し、ギッフは、アルパがグリフィンの力強い表情を再現できるか、疑問視しているようだ。アルパは、良い彫像を造るため、グリフィンが狩猟の際に獲物に放つという突風を、身をもって知りたいという。カステッルム・ベロジナの「ギッフ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_05<tab>You climb atop the griffin and find that it responds well to your commands. Next, you head in Alpa's direction and prepare to unleash a buffet of wind.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_05<tab>ギッフと話した。グリフィンに騎乗した状態で、カステッルム・ベロジナにいる「アルパ」に向かって「突風」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_06<tab>Though struck with the full force of the blast, Alpa appears to be unscathed. Unfortunately, she instinctively closed her eyes due to the power of the blast. She asks you to make another attempt.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_06<tab>アルパに突風を放った。しかし、予想以上の激しさに、アルパは見逃してしまったようだ。再度、グリフィンに騎乗した状態で、カステッルム・ベロジナにいる「アルパ」に向かって「突風」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_07<tab>The griffin whips a second gust of air towards Alpa. Despite making a concerted effort to keep her eyes open, she is only able to catch a glimpse of the creature. She steels herself for one more blast.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_07<tab>アルパに再度突風を放った。アルパは、突風の凄まじさに驚きながらも、グリフィンが獲物を狙う時の鋭い眼光を見逃さなかったようだ。さらに、グリフィンに騎乗した状態で、カステッルム・ベロジナにいる「アルパ」に向かって「突風」を使おう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_08<tab>This time, Alpa is able to witness the awe-inspiring spectacle of the griffin as it summons forth a buffet of wind. Her study of the fearsome creature is now complete and she prepares to capture its majesty in metallic form.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_08<tab>アルパにさらに突風を放った。アルパは、グリフィンが命を懸けた狩りの時に見せる躍動感を見て、何かを掴んだようだ。カステッルム・ベロジナの「アルパ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_09<tab>Alpa's skill as a metalworker is something to behold and Giff is quick to shower her with praise. Despite once being vehemently opposed to her plans for Velodyna, he offers the services of the Resistance's griffin riders. The young captain has succeeded in protecting the castellum from demolition and bolstered the ranks of the Gatekeepers in one deft move.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SEQ_09<tab>アルパと話した。番いのグリフィン像を見たギッフは、国境警備隊への評価を見直したようだ。今後もアルパを手助けし、国境の発展に力を貸していこう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Tahla Molkoh at Castrum Oriens.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_00<tab>カストルム・オリエンスのタラ・モルコー少牙士と話す

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Giff in Rhalgr's Reach.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_01<tab>ラールガーズリーチのギッフと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Alpa at Castellum Velodyna.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_02<tab>カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Giff.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_03<tab>ギッフと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_04<tab>Use the griffin's Buffet ability on Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_04<tab>グリフィンに騎乗してアルパに突風を使う

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_05<tab>Use the griffin's Buffet ability on Alpa again.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_05<tab>グリフィンに騎乗してアルパに再度突風を使う

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_06<tab>Use the griffin's Buffet ability on Alpa yet again.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_06<tab>グリフィンに騎乗してアルパにさらに突風を使う

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Alpa.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TODO_07<tab>アルパと話す

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_001<tab>Oh, there you are, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We've just received a report from Eshana.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_001しゅ～……)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、よいところに。
母上の脱皮状況について、エシャナから報告書が上がってきてな。
今から確認するところじゃったのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_001<tab>I'll read it out.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_001<tab>それじゃ、読み上げるよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_200_001<tab>"At present, the broodmother's skin is smooth.“ Wait─What in Rhalgr's name is this?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_200_001えーっと、現在の指導者の脱皮状況は……「スベスベ期」……？
なんだこりゃ？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_300_001<tab>Good news, that's what. While it's sssmooth, we still have time before she needs to molt. Once it starts to dry, we'll know the day of the inspection is approaching.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_300_001なるほど、スベスベ期か。
ならば、しばらくの間は安心じゃな。
これがムズムズ期になってくると話は別じゃが。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_400_001<tab>Well, I'll take your word for it! As much as I'd love to spend all day talking about your mother's skin, isn't there something else we were going to discuss?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_400_001<tab>いや、オレたちには何のことやらさっぱりだよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_001<tab>Yesss, there is. A problem's come up and I could use your advice. The castellum is under threat of demolition!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_001しゅ～……さて、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ、
実は、困った問題が浮上してな。
近々この関所が取り壊されるかもしれんのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_002<tab>Hold your chocobos─nothing's been decided yet. Perhaps you should start from the beginning for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s sake.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_002こらこら、まだ決まったわけじゃないだろ。
)) (( )) 02 /var>に、ちゃんとイチから説明しな。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_002<tab>As you know, this was originally an imperial sssupply depot. That great big tower in the middle was built as an airship dock, which we now use for surveying the surrounding area. You can see for malms from up there!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_002知ってのとおり、元々ここは帝国軍の補給基地じゃ。
中央にそびえ立つ飛空艇発着用のタワーは、見た目こそ無粋じゃが、
見晴らしがよく、監視には役立っておる。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_003<tab>The trouble is, some of the Resistance members think we should blow the whole thing up! “It's a constant reminder of the days of imperial rule!” they say, but they're letting sentiment cloud their judgment─it's too important to lose.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_003だが、解放軍の中には、帝国の支配の象徴であるこの場所を、
即刻爆破せよという意見を持つ奴らも少なくないみたいでねぇ……。
交通の要衝であるこの橋を壊せだなんて、バカみたいな話だよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_004<tab>They're also forgetting that we don't have the time or resources to build a new bridge. And while we mull things over, there's no telling what those lunatics will do!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_004もちろん、アラミゴ様式に建て直す金や時間なんてありゃしない。
かと言って、過激な連中を放っておけば、何をされるか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_050_004<tab>Suffice it to say, we're in a bit of a bind.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_050_004<tab>どうするつもりだい、アルパ？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_004<tab>We can't let anyone tear it down. If the castellum is destroyed, it would mean the end of the Gatekeepers. I'd have no choice but to return to Vira Nilya.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_004しゅ～……無論、この橋を壊させるわけにはいかぬ。
そんなことになれば、母上は脱皮を待つまでもなく、
わらわは強制送還されることじゃろう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_005<tab>Luckily, I have an idea. We Vira decorate our villages differently to the Qalyana's, which makes them easy to tell apart.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_005そこで、橋の再利用に反対する連中を黙らせる、良い考えがある。
我らウィルラ派の巣は、カリヤナ派の巣と区別するため、
建物の意匠の一部を変えておるのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_006<tab>We should be able to do the same thing with this place. If we make something to symbolize that the castellum is part of Ala Mhigo, we won't need to do anything drastic like rebuilding it from scratch.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_006これと同じことをすれば、建て替えずとも、
建物の印象を変えることができると思ってな！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_007<tab>You know, that's not such a bad idea! But what exactly did you have in mind?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_007へえ、いいじゃないか？
けど、具体的にはどうするつもりなんだい？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_008<tab>It needs to be traditional─something distinctly Ala Mhigan. To be honest, I don't know much about ssstriders and their culture. Do you have any suggestions, J'olhmyn?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_008しゅ～……やはり、アラミゴ文化を取り入れるのが良いじゃろう。
じゃが、わらわはヒトの文化には疎くてな……。
オルミンよ、何か案はないか？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_009<tab>I suppose the most obvious thing would be the griffin on the Ala Mhigan flag, but that's no good.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_009アラミゴ風の意匠と言われて、真っ先に思いつくのは、
国旗にも描かれているグリフィンだろうね。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_010<tab>It was also the symbol of the royal family, which includes the mad king Theodoric, of course. I don't think people would appreciate being reminded of him. Sorry Alpa, nothing else springs to mind.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_010ただ、グリフィンは圧政を敷いていた旧王家の紋章でもあるから、
よく思わない連中もいるかもしれないねぇ……。
ダメだ、オレにはわからないよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_011<tab>Hmmm... Many peoples live throughout Gyr Abania, and we'll struggle to please them all. We would benefit from an outsider's opinion, sssomeone unbiased towards the needs of any particular group.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_011ふ～む、すべてのアラミゴ人に受け入れられる意匠となると、
アラミゴを外から見ることのできる目線が必要じゃな。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_011<tab>They'd need to know a lot about local hissstory too. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, can you think of anyone?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_011)) (( )) 02 /var>……
おぬしの知人に、アラミゴ以外の他国出身者で、
この国の歴史に詳しい者はおらぬか？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_Q1_000_000<tab>何と答える？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_A1_000_001<tab>There's an Adder officer at Castrum Oriens who springs to mind.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_A1_000_001<tab>双蛇党の戦史課に知り合いがいる

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_A1_000_002<tab>Sssorry, no one I know fitsss the bill.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_A1_000_002<tab>覚えていない

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_013<tab>That's a shame. I thought you would've met sssomeone on your travels. Try thinking a bit harder!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_013しゅ～……おぬしのように各地を旅する冒険者ならば、
ひとりぐらいは思い当たる者がおるじゃろう？
よく思い出してみるのじゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_014<tab>Tahla Molkoh? Right! It's decided. We'll meet you there.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_014しゅ～……カストルム・オリエンスに駐屯する、
双蛇党戦史課の「タラ・モルコー少牙士」か……よし！
さっそく、話を聞きに行ってみるのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_020<tab>The mighty Griffin's Bane has descended upon Castrum Oriens once more!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_020やや、あなたは「仮面殺し」の英雄！
また、お会いできて嬉しいです！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_020<tab>We really appreciate your help with that whole Black Rose debacle. We've only just finished cleaning up the mess left behind by the Qalyana.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_020私は先日まで「黒薔薇」に関する対応に追われていて、
つい先ほど、この基地に戻ってきたばかりなんですよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_021<tab>Did she just say “Griffin's Bane”? What does that mean?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_021<tab>しゅ～……「仮面殺し」の英雄とはなんぞや……？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_022<tab>A title, I'd wager. Maybe we ought to call <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> that too?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_022<tab>……オレたちも、そう呼んだ方がいいかい？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_023<tab>Really now! There's no need to be so coy about it. I can think of no better tribute to your remarkable feats of heroism!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_023<tab>そんなに嫌がらなくてもいいじゃないですか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_024<tab>I think we'll stick to just “<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>” for now. Anyway, I'm Alpa, captain of the Velodyna Gatekeepers. You might be wondering what brings us here. We'd like to asssk your opinion.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_024しゅ～……お初にお目にかかる、わらわはアルパと申す。
国境警備隊の警備隊長を務めておる。
今日は、タラ・モルコー少牙士に頼みがあって参ったのじゃ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_025<tab>While I cannot guarantee I'll be able to provide the assistance you seek, I'll do my utmost to help nevertheless.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_025ほほう、お力になれるかはわかりませんが、
詳しい話を聞かせてください。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_026<tab>I heard you know a lot about Ala Mhigan hissstory...
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_026<tab>しゅ～……話せば長くなるのじゃが……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_027<tab>I see your point. Visitors to Ala Mhigo probably won't think highly of being ushered through a former imperial stronghold upon arrival. I agree that it should celebrate Ala Mhigo's unique culture.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_027なるほど……状況は理解しました。
確かに、国の玄関口が帝国製のままなのは、味気ないですしね。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_028<tab>A griffin design should meet your requirements.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_028アラミゴの象徴と言えば、
やはり国旗にも描かれているグリフィンでしょう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_029<tab>That was our one and only idea. We were worried that using the crest of the old royal family would dredge up a lot of unpleasant memories.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_029もちろん、オレらも一度は考えたさ。
でも、旧王家の紋章を快く思わない連中もいると思ってね。
でなけりゃ、グリダニア人に助言を求めたりはしないさ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_030<tab>If it were a single griffin, that may be the case. However, I propose using a pair of griffins.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_030話は最後まで聞いてください。
ただのグリフィンではなく、向かい合う番いにするんです。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_031<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_031<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_031<tab>Once they find a mate they become inseparable. In Gyr Abanian heraldry, a pair of griffins rampant has represented undying loyalty since time immemorial.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_100_031グリフィンは、同じ相手と添い遂げることで知られ、
ギラバニアでは、古くから結束の象徴と考えられてきました。
だからこそ、アラミゴの主門のグリフィン像も番いなんです。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_032<tab>In that case, I should use my metalworking skills to craft two griffin sculptures!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_032しゅ～……ならば造るべきは、番いのグリフィン像じゃな！
王家の象徴ではなく、ギラバニアに生きる者たちの結束を示す像！
うむ、よい案じゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_033<tab>Thanks for your advice, Tahla! Come and visit us at the castellum sssometime!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_033タラ・モルコー少牙士よ、礼を言うぞ！
近く時間のあるときにでも、関所まで遊びに来るがよい！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_034<tab>It would be my pleasure! I wish you the best of luck.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_034はい、ぜひ。
警備隊長、頑張ってくださいね。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_035<tab>I'll start gathering metal for the statues. It might take me a while, especially if we're making two of them. Alpa, you go and find other Ananta to help with the crafting.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_035それじゃ、オレは材料となる金属を手に入れてくるよ。
番いの像を造る分となると、調達には時間がかかると思う。
その間、アルパは金属錬成に長けたアナンタ族を集めておいてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_035<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you be able to bring us a griffin? I imagine it would be hard to sculpt one without seeing the real thing from up close. Probably best to use a tamed one though.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_100_035)) (( )) 02 /var>には、
モデルとなる番いのグリフィンの調達をお願いしようかねぇ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_036<tab>Giff the griffin handler over at the Reach ought to be able to sort something out. If I were you, I'd start by having a word with him.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_036確か、解放軍の「ギッフ」という獣牧士が、
グリフィンの飼育を任されていたはずだよ。
ラールガーズリーチへ行って、話を聞いてきてもらえるかい？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_040<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_040<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_045<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_045<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_050<tab>What can I do for you?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_050<tab>オレに何か用か？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_051<tab>Eh? You've got a friend who wants to “borrow” a griffin? Who do you want me to take it to?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_051知人に頼まれて、番いのグリフィンを借りにきたって？
構わないぞ、お前は、オレたち解放軍にとって恩人だしな。
それで、誰のもとまで運べばいいんだ？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_052<tab>Alpa? The leader of those damn fools hells-bent on preserving Velodyna? Hmph. You ask me, they ought to blow the bloody thing to smithereens and be done with it!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_052カステッルム・ベロジナのアルパだと？
まさか、依頼人は最近新設された国境警備隊か？
帝国の置き土産など、さっさと壊してしまえばよいものを……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_053<tab>But, well...since it's you that's asking, I suppose I can oblige. Go on ahead─I'll meet you there with the griffin.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_053……まあいい、了解した、すぐにグリフィンを用意する。
お前は先にカステッルム・ベロジナへ戻り、
「アルパ」とやらと待っていてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_055<tab>So Griffin's Bane is tasked with procuring an actual griffin? I hope you'll treat this one better than the last!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_TAHLAMOLKOH_000_055「仮面殺し」の英雄は、今度は国境警備隊のお手伝いですか。
いつ、次の仮面と戦うか、楽しみにしているのですが……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_061<tab>How did it go?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_061戻ったか、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
して、グリフィンは調達できたか？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_060<tab>Sorry to keep you waiting, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I got a bit delayed on the way over. Anyway, here's the griffin as requested.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_060……待たせたか？
道中、同盟軍の顔なじみに捕まってしまってな。
ご注文どおり、グリフィンを連れてきてやったぞ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_061<tab>It's beautiful! The statues should turn out wonderfully if I fashion them in the image of this fine ssspecimen.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_061しゅ～……おお、ありがたい！
この子をモデルにして、必ずや、立派な像を造り上げてみせるぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_061<tab>Statues? What are you talking about? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> didn't mention that!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_061像を造るだと！？
いったいどういうことだ？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_061<tab>I want to decorate the entrance with a pair of griffin sssculptures to welcome travelers into Ala Mhigo. They'll be based on your griffin!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_061うむ、この関所を新たなアラミゴの玄関口として、
より相応しいものにするため、象徴となる像を造るのじゃ！
そなたのグリフィンのように美しい彫像をな！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_300_061<tab>You mean to say me and my griffin came all the way here for some bloody statues? You snot-nosed little gobshite─sod off back to Vira Nilya so we can smash this bridge down!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_300_061フン、くだらん！　グリフィンを何に使うのかと思えば、彫像だと？
チビの隊長さんは、よほど暇のようだな？
こんな橋は壊しちまって、ウィルラ・ニリヤへと帰ったらどうだ？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_410_062<tab>Show sssome respect! She is our captain. We will not allow you to ssspeak to her like that.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_410_062シュー……待て、我らの隊長を愚弄するのであれば、
黙って見ているわけにはいかない。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_420_062<tab>Captain, eh? I don't see how anyone could take orders from her─she's just a child!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_420_062ハッ、ずいぶん慕われているみたいだな？
いったい、こんなチビのどこがいいんだか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_430_062<tab>Listen well, ssstrider. When I first volunteered for the Resissstance, every unit I tried to join rejected me. For all my determination, I simply lack the ssstrength needed for frontline warfare. I had no purpose, nowhere to go but back to my village.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_430_062私は、アナンタでありながら戦闘が不得手でな。
故に、解放軍に参加して間もない頃は、
どこの隊からも入隊を断られ、孤立した存在だった。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_440_062<tab>That was until Alpa asked me to work as a weaponsssmith. She showed me that I do not need to be a fighter to contribute.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_440_062そんな折、アルパ隊長から工兵隊に誘われてな。
戦闘以外にも、軍に貢献する方法があると教えてくれたのだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_450_062<tab>She may be young, but she has earned our loyalty.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_450_062隊長は、見た目こそ幼いが、尊敬に値する御方だ。
……偏見で語る前に、その仕事ぶりを見てもらえぬだろうか。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_460_061<tab>Eshana, I─
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_460_061<tab>エシャナ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_470_062<tab>I couldn't give a Qiqirn's arse! I'm only here because <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> asked me. <sigh> Let's just get this over with.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_470_062……ふん。
オレは、)) (( )) 02 /var>に頼まれて来ただけだ。
さっさと用件を済ませてくれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_480_061<tab>You'll help? I won't forget this!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_480_061<tab>おお、恩に着るのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_500_061<tab>If you're going to make a statue of a griffin, you'd better do a good job of it. They look impressive enough when they're standing still, but have you ever seen one buffet its prey with a blast of wind? Now that's something special.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_500_061だが、少しばかり見ただけで、こいつの美しさを理解できるものか。
グリフィンがもっとも美しく力強い表情を見せるのは、
獲物を弱らせるため、突風を起こす時なのだからな。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_600_061<tab>No, I haven't! I'd like to experience these buffeting winds for myself.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_600_061ほう……それは是非とも見てみたいのじゃ。
いや、どうせなら、「突風」とやらを、この身で受けてみたいのう！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_700_061<tab>Is...is this some sort of joke?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_700_061<tab>ほ、本気か……！？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_800_061<tab>Do I look like I'm joking?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_800_061<tab>しゅ～……むろんじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_900_061<tab>The girl's gone stark raving mad! If she wants to have this griffin attack her with the force of a hurricane, that's her business─just leave me out of it!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_900_061正気の沙汰とは思えん……こんなことに付き合ってられるか。
どうしてもというなら、お前がやってくれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_062<tab>Fine. You're not the only one around here capable of riding a griffin! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I hear you're quite experienced with chocobos and whatnot. Why don't you give it a try? Hit me with a buffet of wind!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_062なるほど、)) (( )) 02 /var>は、
騎乗術にも優れていると聞いたことがある！
グリフィンに乗り、わらわに向け「突風」を放ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_062<tab>We should probably find somewhere else to do this. Our comrades might find being asssaulted by bellowing winds a bit distracting, to put it mildly. I'll be waiting by the gates.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_062とは言え、ここでは、他の者の邪魔になろう。
門の方へと移動しようではないか。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_000_063<tab>Ha ha ha! She never ceassses to amaze me.
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ESHANA_000_063<tab>シュシュシュ、強引な所は、あの頃とちっとも変わらないな……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_062<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_062<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_065<tab>Once you're on the griffin, coax it into sending a gust of wind in the direction of that youngling. Just try not to overdo it, all right?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_065よし、準備はいいな。
グリフィンに乗ったら、あの「アルパ」とかいうチビに、
「突風」を放つんだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_066<tab>If you dismount at any point, come back here. I'll get you back in the saddle.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_066もしも降ろされてしまったときは、
もう一度、オレに声をかけてくれ……。
それじゃ、やってみな。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_066<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_066<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_67<tab>I'll be fine! It takes more than a little wind to rattle an Ananta.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_67しゅ～……)) (( )) 02 /var>よ！
おぬしは騎乗術にも優れていると聞いたことがある！
グリフィンに乗り、わらわに向け「突風」を放ってくれ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_070<tab>That's it! Make it send a blassst this way!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_070しゅ～……さあ、わらわに向かって、
グリフィンの「突風」を放つがよい！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_070<tab>Nnnggghhhhhh!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_070<tab>しゅおっ！？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_071<tab><pant> That was a lot stronger than I was expecting! Unfortunately, I couldn't help closing my eyes right at the vital moment.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_071……はぁはぁ、これがグリフィンの突風か……
予想以上の激しさじゃった。
思わず、目を逸らしてしまったのじゃ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_071<tab>Could you do that again?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_071すまぬが、もう一度、わらわに向かって、
グリフィンの「突風」を放ってくれなのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_071<tab>Let's give that another try!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_071すまぬが、もう一度、わらわに向かって、
グリフィンの「突風」を放ってくれなのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_300_071<tab>Hrrrnnngggh!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_300_071<tab>しゅうううううううううううう！！！！！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_400_071<tab>It was only a glimpse but I definitely saw it!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_400_071相変わらず、凄まじい勢いじゃ……。
じゃが、しかと見たぞ！
グリフィンが獲物を狙う時の鋭い眼光を！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_500_071<tab>I think one more time should be enough!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_500_071)) (( )) 02 /var>、これが最後じゃ！
グリフィンが「突風」を放つ時の雄姿を、
わらわに見せてくれなのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_600_071<tab>Get ready for one last buffet!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_600_071)) (( )) 02 /var>、これが最後じゃ！
グリフィンが「突風」を放つ時の雄姿を、
わらわに見せてくれなのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_700_071<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_700_071<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_800_071<tab>Nnnaaagggh!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_800_071<tab>しゅがががががががががががががががッ！！！！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_900_071<tab>I saw it as clear as day! Now I know how its prey must feel!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_900_071……見えたッ……見えたぞッ！！
命を懸けた狩猟の時に見せる、グリフィンの躍動感が！！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_950_072<tab>That will do nicely! All right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you can get down now!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_950_072これで、すべての準備が整ったぞ！
感謝するのじゃ、)) (( )) 02 /var>！
もう、その子から降りてよいぞ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_071<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_071<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_072<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_072<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_073<tab>I'd better get to work while it's ssstill fresh in my mind.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_073この感覚が消えぬ内に、わらわは像の作成に取り掛かる。
おぬしは、しばしの間待っておれ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_075<tab>You want to get back on? The griffin's ready.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_075グリフィンから降ろされてしまったのか？
なら、もう一度乗せてやろう。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_080<tab>I can't believe my eyes...
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_080<tab>これは………………すごい。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_081<tab>With this incredible statue, no one will doubt that Ala Mhigo is on the path to regaining its former glory.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_081国境であるこの場所に、このような力強く美しい像があれば、
アラミゴの威光を内外へと示すことができるぞ……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_082<tab>You've achieved what I thought was impossible. You've transformed this imperial fortress into something our countrymen can be proud of.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_082……大したものだ。
アラミゴの象徴を掲げることで、帝国の軍事拠点から、
我が国の玄関口へと生まれ変わらせるとは……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_083<tab>Heh heh! I'm quite pleased with the results myself!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_083<tab>しゅ～……どうじゃ、立派であろう？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_084<tab>To say I'm impressed would be an understatement. I'd heard the Ananta used magic to shape metal, but to see it for myself... It was breathtaking.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_084……ああ、まったくだ。
アナンタ族が魔法で金属を錬るとは聞いていたが、
まさか、これほどの像を造り出せるとはな……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_084<tab>If you think that's impressive, wait until we finish the other one!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_100_084まだ片方が出来上がっただけじゃ。
これより、もうひとつの像を造らねばならん！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_084<tab>I'm sure you know better than most what a pair of griffins represents.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_200_084我らが掲げるのは、グリフィンの番い……
ギラバニアに住む者の結束と、
アラミゴの未来を示す像なのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_085<tab>Everlasting friendship... By Rhalgr, that's perfect! And to think I was going around saying we should tear this place down! Now I realize what a waste that would've been.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_085まさか、この国のことをそこまで考えていたとはな。
ただ破壊しろとばかり喚いていた自分が、
急に何もできない馬鹿者に思えてきちまったよ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_086<tab>Well, I'm glad you sssee things our way. Besides, we couldn't have done this without your griffin!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_086しゅ～……そんなことはないぞ？
おぬしは、グリフィンを立派に育て上げたではないか。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_087<tab>Such a majestic creature... If the Gatekeepers had one of these, we could sssoar through the sky, casting a watchful eye over the highways and canyons below.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_087この子は素晴らしいぞ！
わらわの隊におれば、どれだけ国境警備が楽になるか……。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_088<tab>I was just about to suggest the same thing. Alpa─would you allow us to station a unit of griffin riders here at the castellum?
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_088……アルパ、いやアルパ隊長よ。
我々、グリフィン騎兵隊を、この関所に駐屯させてもらえないか？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_089<tab>Now that the Garleans have been driven out, we've been at something of a loose end. You Gatekeepers have been working hard to keep the border safe, so we should do our bit too. You have our full cooperation!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_000_089国境警備隊や冒険者たちが、そうしているように、
我々もまたアラミゴの平和のために貢献させてもらいたいのだ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_090<tab>Are you ssserious?
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_090<tab>しゅ～……それはまことか！？

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_091<tab>The griffin riders are always welcome here!
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_091<tab>わ～い、やったのじゃ～！！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_092<tab>That all turned out rather well, wouldn't you say? Now that Giff has changed his tune about the bridge, the rest are sure to follow.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_092どうやら、丸く収まったみたいだねぇ。
ギッフの意見を変えることができたとなれば、
この橋を爆破しろだなんて意見も、そのうち消えるだろうさ。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_093<tab>Yesss, but we've still got a lot of work ahead of us. <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm sure there'll be more chances for you to help in days to come!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_093今後も、辺境地帯の平和と、関所のさらなる発展に、
力を貸してほしいのじゃ！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_094<tab>A pair of griffin statues have been added to Castellum Velodyna.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_094カステッルム・ベロジナに、
「番いのグリフィン像」が建設されました！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_095<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Trusted<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Vira.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_095「アナンタ族：アルパ国境警備隊」との友好関係が、
「信頼」になりました。
関所の発展に力を貸したことで、信頼を勝ち得たようです。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_096<tab>New Vira beast tribe daily quests are now available from Eshana at Castellum Velodyna.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_096これ以降、カステッルム・ベロジナにいる「エシャナ」より、
新たな「蛮族デイリークエスト」を受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_097<tab>Furthermore, you will be able to undertake three additional quests from Eshana as a reputation bonus. This bonus is available until the daily reset time for beast tribe quests.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_097なお、友好ランクが上がった当日に限り、
「エシャナ」から受注できるデイリークエストの数が、
ボーナスとして、3つ追加されています。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_098<tab>These additional quests will become available after accepting all current daily quests from Eshana. Please be advised that you cannot undertake these quests if you have no remaining allowances.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_098友好ランクが上がる前に発行されたデイリークエストを、
すべて受注するとボーナス分が発行され、
受注権のある限り、これを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_099<tab>You now have access to a wider selection of wares from Madhura.
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_099また、「マドゥラ」より、
「友好関係：信頼」の商品を購入できるようになりました。
今後の冒険に役立てましょう！

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>In order to undertake the next beast tribe main quest, you must first complete the main scenario quest “The First of Many.”
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_SYSTEM_000_100次の「蛮族ストーリークエスト」を進行するためには、
「メインクエスト：紅蓮のリベレーター」の、
「いざ山岳地帯へ」を進める必要があります。

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_105<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_ALPA_000_105<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_110<tab>
target: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_JOLHMYN_000_110<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_120<tab>I was keeping an eye on things from a safe distance. But Thal's balls─I didn't think you'd actually go through with it!
target:
TEXT_BANANA002_03037_GIFF_100_120お前がどうするのか様子をうかがっていたが、
まさか、本当にやるとは……。
